TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(object sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(sender As Object, e As DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs)
public delegate void DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs ^ e);

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene datos de eventos.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de .

span.span: Represents the method that will handle the event of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando se crea un delegado , se identifica el método que controlará el evento.When you create a delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controladores de eventos, vea [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra la descarga asincrónica de una cadena.The following code example demonstrates downloading a string asynchronously. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#28)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#28)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#28](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#28)] El siguiente método se llama cuando finaliza la descarga.The following method is called when the download completes. [!code-cpp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CPP/asyncmethods.cpp#29)] [!code-csharp[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/CS/asyncmethods.cs#29)] [!code-vb[NCLWebClientAsync#29](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLWebClientAsync/VB/asyncmethods.vb#29)]
